attributes.action: Allow people who are living with relatives to claim housing benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would help with the lack of local authority housing. It would also leave houses/flats available to those who really need them. It would probably reduce the housing benefits bill as the money being paid would not come close to the cost of paying private landlords the exorbitant rents now being charged.
